email_subject: TECH ALERT: Apple Beats Estimates; EMC, AOL, TI Also Report
email_body: TECHNOLOGY ALERT from The Wall Street Journal Oct. 17, 2001 Apple Computer easily beat lowered quarterly profit expectations late Wednesday but lowered its outlook, citing the weak economy and political uncertainty. See: AOL Time Warner, Texas Instruments, Siebel Systems, EMC and Handspring also posted quarterly results Wednesday.
